mapper.select: select distinct m.*, om.label_option, snm.quantity_notice, i.number stock, sqs.total_quantity_shipped from ( select merchandise_id, shipment_notice_id, quantity_notice from shipment_notice_merchandise where shipment_notice_id = #{id} and is_delete = 0 ) snm inner join shipment_notice sn on sn.id = snm.shipment_notice_id inner join order_merchandise om on om.merchandise_id = snm.merchandise_id and om.order_id = sn.order_id inner join merchandise m on m.id = snm.merchandise_id inner join inventory i on i.merchandise_id = snm.merchandise_id left join ( select sm2.merchandise_id, sum(sm2.quantity_shipped) total_quantity_shipped from ( select id, order_id from shipment_notice where id = #{id} and is_delete = 0 and status != 1 ) sn2 inner join shipment s2 on s2.shipment_notice_id = sn2.id inner join shipment_merchandise sm2 on sm2.shipment_id = s2.id group by sm2.merchandise_id ) sqs on sqs.merchandise_id = m.id

select distinct m.*, om.label_option, om.quantity_required, sqn.total_quantity_notice from ( select merchandise_id, order_id, quantity_required, label_option from order_merchandise where order_id = #{id} and is_delete = 0 ) om inner join merchandise m on m.id = om.merchandise_id left join ( select merchandise_id, sum(quantity_notice) total_quantity_notice from ( select id from shipment_notice where order_id = #{id} and is_delete = 0 and status != 1 ) sn2 inner join shipment_notice_merchandise snm2 on snm2.shipment_notice_id = sn2.id group by merchandise_id ) sqn on sqn.merchandise_id = om.merchandise_id
